plot: A young man deals with his feelings towards the superstore Costco. He searches for meaning in his relationship and ultimately finds out what Costco means to him.
title: Costco Love Soliloquy
plot_es: A young man deals with his feelings towards the superstore Costco. He searches for meaning in his relationship and ultimately finds out what Costco means to him.
plot_en: A young man deals with his feelings towards the superstore Costco. He searches for meaning in his relationship and ultimately finds out what Costco means to him.
